name: R5-Address-R4-Address
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Address into FHIR R4

element.display: An address expressed using postal conventions (as opposed to GPS or other location definition formats)

target.display: An address expressed using postal conventions (as opposed to GPS or other location definition formats)
target.comment: R5 `Address` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address`
R5 `Address.city` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.city`

element.display: Country (e.g. may be ISO 3166 2 or 3 letter code)

target.display: Country (e.g. can be ISO 3166 2 or 3 letter code)
target.comment: R5 `Address.country` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.country`
R5 `Address.district` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.district`
R5 `Address.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.extension`
R5 `Address.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.id`

element.display: Street name, number, direction & P.O. Box etc.

target.display: Street name, number, direction & P.O. Box etc.
target.comment: R5 `Address.line` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.line`

element.display: Time period when address was/is in use

target.display: Time period when address was/is in use
target.comment: R5 `Address.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.period`
R5 `Address.postalCode` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.postalCode`
R5 `Address.state` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.state`
R5 `Address.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.text`

R5 `Address.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/address-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/address-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: home | work | temp | old | billing - purpose of this address

target.display: home | work | temp | old | billing - purpose of this address
target.comment: R5 `Address.use` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Address.use` - use has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/address-use|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/address-use|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
